page.title: 05A Day At School
page.content: When I get up I put on my school uniform. Then I make my breakfast my self. Somedays I have toast or cornflakes. I make my mum and dad a cup of tea in the morning. I go to school on the bus and I sit by my friend Rebecca. The school bus picks up 50 children from Farndon, Coddington, Clutton, Handley and Barton. The driver takes children to Malpas High School after we get off at Clutton. My favourite dinner at school is chips, beans and sausages. My favourite pudding is chocolate eclair. After dinner we have assembly and our teacher talks about something to do with God. After break we go into the class room. This week the head teacher showed us the new video we bought from the school fund.
